item.title: Backward compatible configuration storage
item.description: Backward compatible configuration storage PrestaShop 1.7 keeps the 1.6 configuration class for backward compatibility. If you don’t need compatibility with 1.6 shops, we suggest using the Configuration service instead. Usage Store configuration data Configuration::updateValue(string $key, mixed $value): bool This method returns true if the operation is successful, false otherwise. Parameters: $key Identifier to your data to reuse later. You can use any valid string, but by convention, identifiers are usually in ALL_CAPS_WITH_UNDERSCORES.
